text: “Ndithudi Iye wakuvumbulutsirani m’buku (ili) kuti mukamva ma Ayah (ndime) a Allah akukanidwa ndi kuchitiridwa chipongwe, musakhale pamodzi nawo mpaka alowe m’zokamba zina. (Ngati mutakhala nawo) ndiye kuti mukhala chimodzimodzi ndi iwo. Ndithudi, Allah adzawasonkhanitsa achiphamaso ndi osakhulupirira onse m’moto wa Jahannam
